How to play:
WASD / Arrows moves.
Left Mouse Button (Or Z, or N): Use ability #1
Right Mouse Button (Or X, or M): Use ability #2
Enter to Talk

When standing on a Weapon Platform press a mouse button to swap to it

When standing on a Hat Platform press left mouse button to wear it

Radar (bottom right) shows you where everything is
Stats:
Power: Do more damage
Durability: Take more damage
Speed: Move faster, attack faster
Stamina: Don't get exhausted as fast
Vitality: Heal faster
Spirit: See farther - increase attack range - gain passive xp
